sentences.sContent: This was a feature of agrarian development in Britain.
sentences.sContent_eng: This was a feature of agrarian development in Britain.
sentences.sCn: 这是大不列颠土地发展的一个特征。

sentences.sContent: The patriarchal clan becomes the resistance revolution in the agrarian revolution the strength, therefore encounters suppresses and attacks.
sentences.sContent_eng: The patriarchal clan becomes the resistance revolution in the agrarian revolution the strength, therefore encounters suppresses and attacks.
sentences.sCn: 在土地革命中宗族成为对抗革命的力量，所以遭到抑制和打击。

synos.tran: 土地的；耕地的；有关土地的

remMethod.val: agr(田地， 农业) + arian(表形容词) → 土地的

words.tran: 田地均分法；平均地权论

trans.tranOther: Agrarian means relating to the ownership and use of land, especially farmland, or relating to the part of a society or economy that is concerned with agriculture
